about.heading: T.S.P. Digital
about.description: Strategic technology partner that optimizes your data infrastructure and accelerates your operational workflows using AI and intelligent software.
about.quote: TSP Digital was founded on a clear mission: to accelerate Indonesia's digital advancement. Technology should be an enabler, not a barrier. We partner with clients to solve complex challenges through strategic planning, modern engineering practices, and AI-driven solutions that deliver measurable ROI. Our approach is proactive, data-informed, and focused on sustainable acceleration.

ai.title: AI & ML Integration
ai.description: Unlock the power of your data. We specialize in developing and integrating custom machine learning models and AI-driven automation into your existing operations. From predictive analytics to computer vision, we turn your data from a cost center into a strategic asset.

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.description: Every business is unique. We create tailored solutions that address your specific challenges and opportunities, leveraging cutting-edge technology to give you a competitive edge in your market.

support.description: Our relationship doesn't end at launch. We provide continuous support, monitoring, and optimization to ensure your systems remain efficient, secure, and aligned with your evolving needs.

whatToExpect.description2: From initial concept to final deployment, we ensure every step is optimized for your success.

cta.title: Need Custom Solutions?
cta.description: Our team is ready to help you choose the perfect solution for your specific needs.

phase1.title: Phase 1
phase1.heading: Strategic Deep Dive
phase1.description: We don't write code until we understand your organization. This phase is an intensive immersion into your operational challenges, market position, and strategic goals. We define the precise problem we will solve together.

phase2.title: Phase 2
phase2.heading: Architectural Design & Prototyping
phase2.description: Ideas are translated into tangible, testable designs. We create wireframes and high-fidelity interactive prototypes, allowing you to see and feel the solution before a single line of code is written. No surprises, only precision.

phase3.title: Phase 3
phase3.heading: Agile Development Sprints
phase3.description: This is where the solution is built. We operate in rigorous two-week sprints, delivering functional pieces of the application for your review. You get full transparency and witness progress in real-time, every step of the way.

phase4.title: Phase 4
phase4.heading: Rigorous Quality Assurance
phase4.description: We hunt for flaws so your users don't have to. Our process involves comprehensive testing across devices, scenarios, and security vectors to ensure the final product is stable, secure, and market-ready.

phase5.title: Phase 5
phase5.heading: Deployment & Strategic Partnership
phase5.description: Launch is not the end; it's the beginning of your competitive advantage. We manage the full deployment process and transition into a strategic partnership role, monitoring performance and identifying new opportunities for growth.

projectCarousel.title: Our Strategic Portfolio.
projectCarousel.description: A showcase of high-impact projects delivered for clients in critical industries.

aerial.title: AI-Powered Aerial Inspection System
aerial.description: Developed and integrated a YOLOv8 computer vision system to detect aircraft body damage from drone footage, enhancing inspection speed and accuracy in a high-stakes environment.

attendance.title: Real-Time Project & Attendance Platform
attendance.description: Engineered a full-stack system to streamline task management, attendance, and leave tracking, providing total operational visibility for business teams.

health.title: Predictive Health Modeling
health.description: Designed and deployed machine learning models (Random Forest & XGBoost) in functional web apps to provide real-time disease risk predictions based on user health data.

bloodBank.title: Nationwide Blood Bank Application
bloodBank.description: Architected a complex, scalable web platform to connect blood donors with recipients, featuring a high-performance backend built with Go and gRPC.

pothole.title: AI-Powered Infrastructure Monitoring
pothole.description: Developed and fine-tuned a pothole detection system that generates automated PDF reports for infrastructure maintenance.

identity.title: Decentralized Identity Platform
identity.description: Engineered a secure identity management platform using Motoko Backend, allowing users to generate unique ID addresses for seamless and private integration with companies.

emergency.title: Emergency Autoresponder System
emergency.description: Trained a TensorFlow model on 20,000 images to detect traffic accidents, forming the core of an automated emergency response system.

commercial.title: Full-Stack Booking & Dashboard Systems
commercial.client: Suma Barber, PT Aitiserve, and Others
commercial.description: Developed and maintained multiple commercial web applications, including online booking systems and dynamic data dashboards using React, Next.js, and Node.js.

footer.description: We partner with organizations to implement strategic technology solutions that drive acceleration, efficiency, and competitive differentiation.
